Reference

Dataset endpoints

Endpoints accessing datasets (i.e. expression experiments), and their associated properties and files.

getDataset()

Dataset expression and design

getDatasetAnnotations()

Dataset annotations

getDatasetDE()

Dataset differential expression

getDatasetDEA()

Dataset differential analysis

getDatasetDesign()

Dataset design

getDatasetExpression()

getDatasetExpression

getDatasetPlatforms()

Dataset platforms

getDatasetResultSets()

getDatasetResultSets

getDatasetSamples()

Dataset samples

getDatasetTidy()

Tidy expression and design

getDatasetsInfo()

Datasets

searchDatasets()

Dataset search

Platform endpoints

Endpoints accessing platforms, and their associated properties and files.

getPlatformAnnotation()

Gemma platform annotations

getPlatformDatasets()

Platform datasets

getPlatformElementGenes()

Platform element genes

getPlatformElements()

Platform elements

getPlatformsInfo()

Platforms

Gene endpoints

Endpoints accessing genes (non taxon-specific).

getGeneGO()

Gene goTerms

getGeneLocation()

Gene locations

getGeneProbes()

Gene probes

getGenesInfo()

Genes

Other functions

Remaining endpoints and helper functions.

forgetGemmaMemoised()

Clear gemma.R cache

searchAnnotations()

Annotation search
